channel.title: Kind of Lost..and feel stupid at the same time =(
channel.description:
I am trying to change the IP address to mine on a 525 client I downloaded. I am really good at coding 317s, but I want to move up a bit. If anyone knows what file contains the IP I need to change? I am using Jc-Scape client, and I already changed
[code]Class20.aString409 = "Jc-Scape.no-ip.info";[/code]
in client.java to
[code]Class20.aString409 = "MYSERVERIP.no-ip.biz";[/code]
But I ended up with this error in the command prompt for the client when i save compile and run.
[code]error_game_invalidhost[/code]
I do have my server side running smoothly though.

item.title: Kind of Lost..and feel stupid at the same time =(
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
